name: Airplane Flight Simulator Pro
description:
Unleash your passion to become a pilot of skies. Devbatch presents this extreme 3D Air Race & training game with high speed and full of exciting flying competition for mobile users. In this free skybox air race game you will experience new dimension of Airplane flying and training. Lets fly the airplanes to win air race championship of this summer. You have to follow the path and avoid from air obstacles & buildings. Tumble, whirl & hurtle in the air & perform awesome stunts & tricks.

In this 3D Flight simulator & training challenge game you will experience the next level of high speed air simulation game play just like a realistic Airplane cockpit. You have to fly very carefully, pass the obstacles and reach the finish line within given time. The best Flight Simulator, Air Training game on Google Play.


Airplane Flight Simulator Pro Features:
- Real Air race game
- Realistic 3D graphics & Animations
- Challenging & fun filled missions with skyscrapers & obstacles
- Awesome aerobatic airplane & aircraft
- Specially designed for mobile & tablets
- Addicted gameplay
- Smooth mobile controls
- Absolutely Free
- Many fulfilled 3D race missions and chapters
- Full Action packed music and sound effects
- Easy to play
- No Internet required
- No In-App Purchases
